our method.from sentence: For AFLW - LFPA , our method outperforms the best methods with a large margin of 17.8 % improvement .

AFLW2000 - 3D.from sentence: For AFLW2000 - 3D , our method also shows a large improvement .

IJB - A dataset.from sentence: For the IJB - A dataset , even though we are able to only compare the accuracy for the three labeled landmarks , our method still reaches a higher accuracy .

images.from sentence: Specifically , for images with yaw angle in [ 60 , 90 ] , our method improves the performance by 28 % ( from 7.93 to 5.68 ) .

300W dataset.from sentence:
Even though the proposed method can handle largepose alignment , to show its performance on the near- frontal datasets , we evaluate our method on the 300W dataset .
Our method is the second best method on the challenging set .

of.from sentence: In general , the performance of our method is comparable to other methods that are designed for near - frontal datasets , especially under the following consideration .
